pkgmetadata.longdescription: # xonsh-tcgThis is a [Xonsh](https://xon.sh/) plugin for tcg. To install this plugin, do```bashxpip install xonsh-tcg```After installation, add```xonshxontrib load tcg```to your `.xonshrc` to load it automatically. Then `tcg` will automatically createcgroup for your shells. The cgoup of the current shell will be displayed in`$PROMPT` and `$TITLE`.
